author: David J. Lynch, Michael Birnbaum, Ellen Nakashima, Paul Sonne
title: Historic sanctions on Russia had roots in Zelensky’s emotional appeal
description: Video call by Ukraine’s wartime leader prompted jaded European leaders to act.
content: After a perfunctory debate, the presidents and prime ministers quickly approved sanctions on Russian President Vladimir Putin, Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov and some of Russias biggest banks. Talk o… [+10431 chars]
